description: Try our easy to follow Sichuan Pickled Cucumber recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sichuan Pickled Cucumber Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cucumbers into finger-thick batons and put into a wide glass or ceramic bowl.
Mix together all the remaining ingredients in a small bowl and pour them over the cucumber. Toss to mix well. Cover and let marinate at room temperature for 1 hour.
Spoon onto small plates and serve with rice.
